metadata.Title: CVE-2020-26570 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The Oberthur smart card software driver in OpenSC before 0.21.0-rc1 has a heap-based buffer overflow in sc_oberthur_read_file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-26570` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

opensc - 0.21.0-1
opensc-pkcs11 - 0.21.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: opensc package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.21.0-1').
